About.paragraph: We Build This Functional System to Support the Procurement Process in Our Organization. With Suppliers Perspective,Our System Accelerates The Tender Process and Save Time That Has Significant Effect In Most Suppliers Any One Who Has Legal Documents Showing His Validity As A Supplier In Ethiopian Context Can Work With Us!

Services.name: Free Registration
Services.text: You Can Register As A Supplier For Free Without Any Subscription Fee

Services.name: Online Bid Purchasing
Services.text: You Can Buy Bid Documents Via You YenePay Wallet

Services.name: Apply Everywhere You Are
Services.text: No matter where you are, You can Participate in Tenders

Features.title: Purchase Bids
Features.text: You can pay the bid fee via yenepay account and get the tender information and bid documents

Features.title: Apply With Your Hands
Features.text: You hava phone,laptop or tablet. all you need is register as a supplier and apply from home

Features.title: Follow Up Tenders
Features.text: You can follow up the status of tenders you've applied

Features.title: Get Email Notification
Features.text: After Registration,You will get Email Notification of New Tenders
